Posts.Content: Marybeth, are you still out there? I had bilateral mastectomy June 27th with immediate reconstruction with permanent expandable saline implants. I've been looking for someone with longer term experience with saline implants who could share her experience with this type of implant. That's how I found this thread. Since you responded to Regi I thought you might be willing to share. Thanks, Candis
Posts.Title: Reconstruction
